settings.faq_title: What is the minimum order quantity?
settings.faq_text: The minimum batch is 3000 pcs for one color and one model. We can make it even less, but the price will increase.
After placing an order, the client pays 30% in advance and the preparation of the order begins. After the product is ready, he pays 70% and can take it out.

settings.faq_title: Can you make products with our own brand?
settings.faq_text: Yes, we will definitely prepare it

settings.faq_title: How long does it take for the product to be ready after payment?
settings.faq_text: After the payment is made, the client's order will be ready within 2-2.5 months on average. It is possible to do it even earlier, we will let you know in a separate conversation.

settings.faq_title: Who do we contact during the order process and the order preparation process?
settings.faq_text: Before the order is received, a special sample for the product to be prepared for you will be prepared and your approval will be obtained, and 1 sales manager will contact you. He will be in contact with you every day and will answer any of your questions, provide daily information on your order.

settings.faq_title: Can you make an individual design yourself?
settings.faq_text: Yes, of course. If you need a design, we will prepare it, and we can make a contract for the production of this design just for you.
